title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Intelligence Witness
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A curious amateur spy novelist stumbles upon a genuine intelligence operation at a Prague hostel and is eliminated to protect state secrets he never actually understood.

death_teaser: He always wanted to write spy thrillers. He never wanted to live one.
